upcimg.php File Reference

Creates an image of the barcode using Image_Barcode. More...

Go to the source code of this file.

Detailed Description

Creates an image of the barcode using Image_Barcode.

Uses the PHP Imagage_Barcode Extention to generate barcode images for the entered barcode. This may need to be (it can't cause any harm) used in compination with pear.inc on shared hosts and other environments.

See also:
http://pear.php.net/package/Image_Barcode

http://pear.php.net/manual/en/package.images.image-barcode.php
